testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Quincy Resident
testimonials.content: The produce at Adams Shore is always so fresh! I love that they source from local farms. The staff is always helpful and friendly too.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Loyal Customer
testimonials.content: Best neighborhood grocery store around! They always have everything I need and the prices are reasonable. Their bakery section is amazing!

testimonials.name: Lisa Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Weekly Shopper
testimonials.content: I appreciate that they accept SNAP/EBT. Makes shopping for my family so much easier. The quality of meat and produce is consistently good.
